control.visible: [[[Container.Content(movies) | Container.Content(sets)] + Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixLandscapeView)] | [[Container.Content(tvshows) | Container.Content(seasons) | Container.Content(episodes)] + !Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixTVPosters) + !Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixMovieBoxsets)]] + Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixMoviesCenterList) + Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixMoviesLowerInfo)

[[Container.Content(Movies) | Container.Content(Sets)] + !Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixMovieBoxsets) + ![[Container.Content(tvshows) | Container.Content(tvshows)] + Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixMovieBoxsets)] + !Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixLandscapeView) + !Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixClearArtView) + !Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixDiscArtView)] + [!Skin.Hassetting(KodiFlixCases) | ListItem.IsCollection | !Skin.HasSetting(usecases)] | [[Container.Content(tvshows) | Container.Content(seasons)] + Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixTVPosters)]

[[Container.Content(Movies) | Container.Content(Sets)] + !Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixMovieBoxsets) + ![[Container.Content(tvshows) | Container.Content(tvshows)] + Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixMovieBoxsets)] + [Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixLandscapeView) | Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixClearArtView)]] | [[Container.Content(TVShows) | Container.Content(Seasons)] + !Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixTVPosters) + !Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixMovieBoxsets)] | Container.Content(episodes)

[[Container.Content(Movies) | Container.Content(Sets)] + !Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixMovieBoxsets) + ![[Container.Content(tvshows) | Container.Content(tvshows)] + Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixMovieBoxsets)] + [Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixLandscapeView) | Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixClearArtView)]] | [[Container.Content(TVShows) | Container.Content(Seasons)] + !Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixTVPosters) + !Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixMovieBoxsets)] | Container.Content(episodes)

[System.IdleTime(5) + Control.HasFocus(800) + Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixExtras) + !ListItem.IsParentFolder + Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixExtrasDelay_5)] | [System.IdleTime(10) + Control.HasFocus(800) + Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixExtras) + !ListItem.IsParentFolder + Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixExtrasDelay_10) ] | [System.IdleTime(20) + Control.HasFocus(800) + Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixExtras) + !ListItem.IsParentFolder + Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixExtrasDelay_20)] | [System.IdleTime(30) + Control.HasFocus(800) + Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixExtras) + !ListItem.IsParentFolder + Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixExtrasDelay_30)]

animation.condition: Control.IsVisible(800) + Skin.HasSetting(usecases) + Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixOpenCase) + [!String.IsEmpty(Container.ListItem.Art(discart)) | !String.IsEmpty(Window(home).Property(SkinHelper.ListItem.0.Art.DiscArt)) | Skin.HasSetting(Fakedischandwriting)| Skin.Hassetting(fakediscart)] + !Skin.HasSetting(clearcases) + Container.Content(movies) + !Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixMoviesCenterList) + !Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixMoviesCenterFocus)

Control.IsVisible(800) + Skin.HasSetting(usecases) + Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixOpenCase) + [!String.IsEmpty(Container.ListItem.Art(discart)) | !String.IsEmpty(Window(home).Property(SkinHelper.ListItem.0.Art.DiscArt))] + Skin.HasSetting(clearcases) + Container.Content(movies) + Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixMoviesCenterList) + !Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixMoviesCenterFocus)

Control.IsVisible(800) + Skin.HasSetting(usecases) + Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixOpenCase) + [!String.IsEmpty(Container.ListItem.Art(discart)) | !String.IsEmpty(Window(home).Property(SkinHelper.ListItem.0.Art.DiscArt)) | Skin.HasSetting(Fakedischandwriting)| Skin.Hassetting(fakediscart)] + !Skin.HasSetting(clearcases) + Container.Content(movies) + !Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixMoviesCenterList) + !Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixMoviesCenterFocus) + !String.IsEmpty(ListItem.Art(discart))

Control.IsVisible(800) + Skin.HasSetting(usecases) + Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixOpenCase) + [!String.IsEmpty(Container.ListItem.Art(discart)) | !String.IsEmpty(Window(home).Property(SkinHelper.ListItem.0.Art.DiscArt))] + Skin.HasSetting(clearcases) + Container.Content(movies) + Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixMoviesCenterList) + !Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixMoviesCenterFocus) + !String.IsEmpty(ListItem.Art(discart))

Control.IsVisible(800) + Skin.HasSetting(usecases) + Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixOpenCase) + [!String.IsEmpty(Container.ListItem.Art(discart)) | !String.IsEmpty(Window(home).Property(SkinHelper.ListItem.0.Art.DiscArt))] + Skin.HasSetting(clearcases) + Container.Content(movies) + Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixMoviesCenterList) + Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixMoviesCenterFocus) + !String.IsEmpty(ListItem.Art(discart))
